Name: nosophobia
Definition: A specific phobia that involves an irrational fear of contracting a disease.

Name: animal phobia
Definition: A specific phobia that involves a fear caused by the presence or thought of a specific animal that poses little or no danger at all.

Name: flying phobia
Definition: A specific phobia that is characterized by a fear of flying.
Synonym: spindle cell melanoma of the Ciliary body
